name: Aponia ( Honkai Impact )
description:
For Aponia Outfit use tags: aponia_outfit, 1girl, blue eyes, breasts, large breasts, looking at viewer, nun, veil, black dress, breast curtains, detached sleeves, long sleeves, frills, pelvic curtain, sideless outfit, thigh strap

If you want to add her wings to her outfit add: butterfly dress

For bikini, we use: aponia_bikini, aponia, 1girl, breasts, large breasts, white headwear, earrings, hair ornament, butterfly ornament, frilled swimsuit, frills, one-piece swimsuit, criss-cross halter
For casual: aponia, 1girl, blue eyes, breasts, large breasts

I also included a LoRA that's a bit overfitted on her original outfit, but it can make it accurate in like 95% cases even when using 4+ LoRAs, but it has really hard time making her wear anything else. Use it if you only care about her outfit or you can't get her outfit to look good with standard one.

For OG_outfit: aponia, aponiaoutfit, 1girl, breasts, large breasts, blue eyes, mole under eye, eyes visible through hair, mole, nun, blonde hair, long hair, bangs, hair between eyes, veil, black dress, breast curtains, detached sleeves, long sleeves, frills, pelvic curtain, sideless outfit, butterfly dress
